mobileResponsivenessTip: Consider optimizing images and UI elements to load faster and be more responsive on mobile devices.
loadingSpeedTip: Improve image compression and minimize HTTP requests to enhance the overall speed of the website.
seoOptimizationTip: Implement structured data (schema.org) and optimize meta tags to improve search engine ranking.
userExperienceTip: Provide more intuitive navigation for easier access to key information and services.
bookingFlowTip: Simplify the booking process by reducing the number of steps to completion.
tips: Optimize image sizes for faster loading times.
Improve mobile navigation for better accessibility on smaller screens.
Enhance SEO by adding alt text for images and improving internal linking.
